Enums/WVRequestType.html.name: WVRequestType
Enums/WVRequestType.html.abstract: Describes the type of request to be made.

Enums/WVOutputType.html.name: WVOutputType
Enums/WVOutputType.html.abstract: Describes the type of output to be made.

Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.name: baseParameters
Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.abstract: All of these parameters will be copied to every request created from this manager.

Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.name: baseURL
Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.abstract: A base URL. This URL could be used for an API start. (i.e. https://api.github.com)

Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.name: session
Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.abstract: A URL session used by underlying NSURLSession framework. Defaults to URLSession.shared. Can be changed to a background session to download large files in the background.

Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.name: init(baseURL:baseParameters:)
Classes/WVManager.html#/s:5Weave9WVManag.abstract: Creates a new manager with base parameters.

Classes/WVJSONResponse.html#/s:5Weave14W.name: json
Classes/WVJSONResponse.html#/s:5Weave14W.abstract: The JSON object after parsing. Depending on the API, you will need to cast this into an array or dictionary.

Classes/WVParsedResponse.html#/s:5Weave1.name: parseResult
Classes/WVParsedResponse.html#/s:5Weave1.abstract: Subclasses of this class can provide anything here. See documentation for the individual parser.

Classes/WVResponse.html#/s:5Weave10WVRes.name: statusCode
Classes/WVResponse.html#/s:5Weave10WVRes.abstract: The status code, if the request succeeded.

Classes/WVResponse.html#/s:5Weave10WVRes.name: data
Classes/WVResponse.html#/s:5Weave10WVRes.abstract: The raw data recieved from the request.

Classes/WVManagedRequest.html#/s:5Weave1.name: timeoutInterval
Classes/WVManagedRequest.html#/s:5Weave1.abstract: Number of seconds to try requesting for. Defaults to 10.

Classes/WVManagedRequest.html#/s:5Weave1.name: start(finishHandler:)
Classes/WVManagedRequest.html#/s:5Weave1.abstract: Starts the HTTP(S) request to the endpoint specified.

Classes/WVManagedRequest.html.name: WVManagedRequest
Classes/WVManagedRequest.html.abstract: The main class to make requests with. This can’t be created from this class; instead, create a request from a WVManager.

Classes/WVResponse.html.name: WVResponse
Classes/WVResponse.html.abstract: A class that is a response from a request. This is a base class for many other response subclasses.

Classes/WVParsedResponse.html.name: WVParsedResponse
Classes/WVParsedResponse.html.abstract: A subclass of WVResponse designed to handle responses that need to be parsed or formatted.

Classes/WVStringResponse.html.name: WVStringResponse
Classes/WVStringResponse.html.abstract: A WVParsedResponse for parsing responses into strings.

Classes/WVJSONResponse.html.name: WVJSONResponse
Classes/WVJSONResponse.html.abstract: A WVParsedResponse for parsing responses into JSON objects.
